packages.name: provider helm
packages.description: This provider is a Crossplane Provider that enables deployment and management of Helm Releases on Kubernetes clusters typically provisioned by Crossplane.

packages.name: provider kubernetes
packages.description: This provider is a Crossplane Provider that enables deployment and management of arbitrary Kubernetes objects on clusters typically provisioned by Crossplane.

packages.name: package gitops
packages.description: This package is a Crossplane Package that enables deployment and management of Gitops on Kubernetes clusters typically provisioned by Crossplane.

packages.name: package core
packages.description: This package is a Crossplane Package that enables deployment and management of core resources on Kubernetes clusters typically provisioned by Crossplane.

packages.name: package component
packages.description: This package is a Crossplane Package that enables deployment and management of component resources on Kubernetes clusters typically provisioned by Crossplane.
